content: **this delightful piece not only fills your space with festive charm but also serves as a practical air freshener blending form and function seamlessly this pattern includes notes for creating a smaller version stand-alone tree or an even smaller version for a cute ornament and my own way of creating a granny square without moving seems and strange lumps at the end/beginning of rounds this piece has a pocket to hide cinnamon sticks cloves or anything else you like to create an air freshener along with it s eye-catching appeal ** check out regina p designs website to find out more get sneak peeks free patterns & sales https //www reginapdesigns com/ if you have any questions about this pattern or any of the other patterns from regina p designs or want to show off your finished projects with our patterns please join our facebook group https //www facebook com/groups/869715883461437/ ***materials *** yarn bee soft & sleek yarn in any shade of green approx 50 yds total h 5 mm hook scissors needle stitch markers a hand full of smaller wooden buttons needle & thread jute twine bow wooden star 12 long dowel 4 wide wooden disc cinnamon sticks & hot glue ***abbreviations us terms *** skip = skip sts = stitches st = stitch sl= slip_stitch chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet gap = the chain space not the actual chains copyright 2024 regina p designs all rights reserved all content copyright and other rights reserved by regina p designs no content may be duplicated without express written consent by purchasing/downloading/using any regina p designs patterns you agree to the terms of use -all regina p designs patterns are for personal use only -it is prohibited to reproduce copy publish in any form including video or distribute this pattern its parts or photos in any way or form including translations into foreign languages -you are free to do as you wish with the finished products made from these patterns with the agreement that regina p designs will be credited for the pattern itself return/refund policy due to the fact that it is impossible to return a digital file all sales are final if you have a problem with working out parts of a pattern please contact the designer for help
